explanation: [0-0] In the living room, a boy wearing a gray and white striped shirt and gray pants is standing barefoot on a puzzle mat with a red object in his right hand. A man wearing a red short-sleeved shirt and gray feather-patterned pants is facing away from the camera, squatting by the sofa. There are several RMB bills on the sofa. There is a white and gray refrigerator to the left of the sofa. The wall is white.
